data.name: Cloudlands : VR Minigolf Demo
data.detailed_description:
Welcome to Cloudlands : VR Minigolf! Cloudlands is a virtual reality minigolf experience like you've never experienced before. Be transported to a beautifully landscaped island archipelago above the clouds. This demo includes only a single player experience with a few holes to play.


You will find no swing or power meters in Cloudlands. Cloudlands uses an intuitive 1:1 control mapping between the virtual putter and your Vive controller. Expect your real-life skills to translate into the virtual world (oh no!). Don't worry though. It's mini golf! Everyone can have fun and play.


Cloudlands includes one fantastical 18 hole course. The course is split between 3 different seasons so expect to see summer, autumn, and winter themed holes. Expect to be challenged by ball cannons, floating bridges, spinning obstacles, and multi-island holes.


What could be better than playing Cloudlands by yourself? Playing with friend and family of course! We offer local multiplayer (only 1 VR Headset required) so you can play a competitive round from the comfort of your own home.


We will be offering online multiplayer as a free update shortly after launch. While the feature is completed on our end, we are thoroughly testing it to make sure the experience is as smooth and bug free as possible before we put it in your hands.


Bored of the existing holes and want to play some new ones? Shortly after launch we will be including (for free), a course editor to allow you to build, share, and play other user created holes. Build in god mode and instantly play your course in real time. Lock your pieces to a grid or use complete free form to create some ridiculous holes never before seen or played before.


Over 20 challenging Steam Achievements to test your precision and accuracy with a putter

data.short_description: Cloudlands is a VR minigolf experience transporting you to a beautifully landscaped course high above the clouds. Single player, local multiplayer, online multiplayer (coming soon), and a course editor (coming soon) allow you to build, share, and play other user generated holes.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7,8 or 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 equivalent or greater
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 /Radeon R9 290 equivalent or greater
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
